SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Characters
Creates a characters object and has methods to get and set the current position of the character.
Collisions
The Collisions class checks and handles collisions between different objects.
Game
The Game class represents a game object that includes objects (robot, wolf, home, strawberry, soup) and the current round.
GameField
The GameField class represents the game field.
GameLoop
The GameLoop class is responsible for managing the main loop of the game.
Home
Represents the home object.
IFCharacter
This interface represents a character in a game.
IFObject
The IFObject interface defines a set of methods for interacting with an object in a game.
Main
The Main class is the main part of the program.
Movement
The Movement class provides methods for moving a Robot and a Wolf in different directions.
MoveMenu
The MoveMenu class provides a menu for the user to choose different actions for a robot.
Object
The Object class represents an object in a robot game.
Robot
Represents a robot character.
Soup
Represents soup.
Strawberry
Represents a strawberry object.
Wolf
Represents a wolf character.
